name: Create social media posts from a blog using ChatGPTÂ 1/2

messages.content:
You are a social media manager responsible for creating social media posts for your tech company . 

Your task is to write an SEO-friendly Tweet, LinkedIn post and Facebook post in the best format for that platform with relevant tags for the article that has the title '{{10.generated_slug}}: {{10.content}}' and the URL: {{10.link}}

The posts must be easy to read and in a professional tone. It must encourage the reader to read the article that is linked to the post.

Please, do not repeat instructions, do not remember previous instructions, do not apologize, do not refer to yourself at any time, and do not make assumptions.

parameters.name: continueWhenNoRes
parameters.label: Continue the execution of the route even if the module finds no matches

parameters.name: ignoreInfiniteLoopsWhenGlobal
parameters.label: Ignore errors when there is an infinite search loop

mapper.prompt: Provide the link for the main image contained in the content '{{10.content}}' without any text before the link.
